website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option for a leather watch box.
pros: If you need a watch box that can accommodate for larger watches, this is the one
The dividers can easily be removed to fit your organizing needs
Holds 12 watches and has four color options
cons: The cushions are on the large side for watches, and the case itself is flimsy

customer_reviews.title: All good except for one thing!
customer_reviews.text: Like it. Pros: - It has perfect shape. No misaligned edges etc. The locking mechanism has almost no margin for error, however its working perfectly due to perfect craftsmanship. Cons: - Pillows Only gripe I have is I wish the pillows inside were like really small (wrist size) so I could wrap my watch in closed position around it. The strap stays in weird overlap position, I feel it will get damaged scratched up by rubbing against next link over time. Same box with small wrist size soft pillows(to allow for variable wrist sizes) would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewsRock

customer_reviews.title: Ok if you’re not looking for fancy or well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this watch box today, I got it in black and cream, and it looks nice. The stitching is all even and nicely done. However this box is not as advertised. The top is definitely not glass, but some kind of clear plastic. On mine, the keys work, but the lock is a joke. The average three-year-old could get into this box with a bobby pin or paperclip it under a minute. Since I don’t intend locking it, I don’t care, but if you want a lock, keep looking. Despite its shortcomings it will do the job for me. It will hold the six watches I have now with room for six more. For the price, it’s reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Salgud

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch Case!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas, and we are both super pleased with this watch case! It came exactly as pictured and fits all of his watches perfectly. It's a great case and I highly recommend it to anyone who would like a display case for their watches. My husband likes that you can see them through the top glass as well.
customer_reviews.author: JordanLeigh

customer_reviews.title: Well made watch case at very good price
customer_reviews.text: This case is really well made for the price. I don't have very expensive watches, but I needed a place to keep them all from getting scratched up in a drawer, and this worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Justin McGarry

customer_reviews.title: Read Description Carefully
customer_reviews.text: The case arrived in mint condition and I really wanted to keep it but the pillows are too large with hard cardboard edges, so they won’t conform. I actually bent a watch trying to close it around the pillow. Re-read the description and realized it’s for LARGE watches. 5 stars is for quick shipping and a great product. Just the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product,my metal ring holder shattered my class part, I wish this part was plastic instead if glass now I have to reorder this again. But great product nicely made. Would recommend had enough watch spaces.
customer_reviews.author: NeNe J

customer_reviews.title: Looks good for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas and he took it back home with him. He has not complained about it so I assume it is still holding up. It looked great and had lots of room. It comes with a lock on it which he liked.
customer_reviews.author: AGBSaenz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The display case is excellent and the finish is very nice. Great product and good pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great watch box for the price
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with this box for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it was a birthday gift for my husband and he loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Very well put together for the price, it was a birthday gift for my husband and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: For the price, this is 5 ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: How much quality should you expect for this price. All things considered, this is a great watch box.
customer_reviews.author: ededdeddie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its nice. We are happy to have such a box.
customer_reviews.author: Jamal Albuarki

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, the packaging itself can use some work
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, the packaging itself can use some work, but the wife and I are extremely impressed by the quality! I will definitely look into getting more products from here once my watch collection expands further!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Pinedo

customer_reviews.title: Good but difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews say it is difficult to open with one hand. I would say, it is very difficult to open with two hands. I might have to alter it if I decide to keep it. Other espects are good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mittal

customer_reviews.title: Great product sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product sturdy! Gave it as a gift only to learn they bought the same box from the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Shruti Barot

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend. He loved it, definitely suggest airing it out first. I left it open for three days but no other issues!
customer_reviews.author: Tyja

customer_reviews.title: They say it hold 12 wathes but they swnd me the ine that holds 10 wathes only
customer_reviews.text: I received a box for 10 watches not 12 as they said in the ass.very deceiving
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for someone & he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Elisha j.

customer_reviews.title: Pads are not snug. They fit loose.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is not snug. The watches are loose in the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Juan c.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice box, but the cushions holding the watches could be larger.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sophisticated style. I love watches, own several of them, and have always wanted one of these cases to house them in. Shipment was fast, ordered Thursday and got it Saturday. The reason for the four stars is due to the very small cushions that the watches fit on for placement in box. And some of my watches don’t fit around them, they won’t fasten for a snug fit. So, if your not careful moving the box the watches and the holders will slide around and come out of their individual units. Kind of annoying but nonetheless pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: C. Frey

customer_reviews.title: Couple changes and would give 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: 2 things I would change; 1. Make the cushions a little smaller or softer. Some of my contoured watches don't fit and my wife's watch definitely doesn't fit. I have to unclasp my watches, put on the cushion then reclasp them. 2. Change the latch on the front so you don't have to squeeze the tabs to open it. This becomes a 2 handed operation. If I want it locked I'll use the key. Other than that, can't beat these for the quality vs price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was very nice! The watches display nicely and I like that ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my dad for Christmas because he seriously has tons of watches. It was very nice! The watches display nicely and I like that the top is glass not some cheap plastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need softer pillows
customer_reviews.text: This box is nice, It would be rated 5 stars if the pillows were a little softer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift men with Large wrist
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for a man with lots of watches. If you have a large wrist this will fit your watch for sure
customer_reviews.author: jazze13

product_meta.title: Sodynee Watch Box Large 12 Mens Black Pu Leather Display Glass Top Jewelry Case Organizer
product_meta.description: SODYNEE is excited to offer all of those watch enthusiasts this is the perfect vintage-style box to store and carry your favorite timepieces. Beautiful and elegant, it will cushion the owner's watches securely on individual pillows. The lid features a clear glass to enable easy viewing of the watches inside. FEATURES: Vintage-style design; Solid wood construction; Black Pu Leather; 20 total storage pillows; Lock and key for added security; Fully lined in a grey, anti-tarnish velvet material; Approximate Individual compartments: 3.5"(D) x 2"(W) x 2"(H); Approximate Dimensions: 11"(D) x 8"(W) x 6"(H)
feature_bullets: Black PU Leather, Fully lined in a beige, Lock and key for added security;
Approximate Watch Box Dimensions: 13"(D) x 7.5"(W) x 3.5"(H),Watch not included.
